example.text: The Democrats' reckless spending in Washington has sent inflation skyrocketing, costing the average American family an additional $8,000 per year. Democrats have made it clear they would rather continue with radical government spending than work to reverse the problems their failed policies have created.

Senate Republicans are united behind [[user]] and [[user]]. In a divided government, Biden must come to the table. Republicans passed a good bill to raise the debt ceiling and prevent default. Now it's in Biden's hands. [[user]]: Show us your cards and negotiate. [[url]]

My office has returned millions of dollars to constituents from state and federal agencies, taken on the IRS, and ensured our veterans receive the benefits they have earned. One hundred bills were introduced, over one thousand bills were cosponsored, and countless committee markups took place.

Joe Biden is single-handedly responsible for the worst border catastrophe in American history. He has abandoned our brave border patrol officers, empowered drug cartels and traffickers, and exposed our country to a devastating fentanyl crisis. Repealing #Title42 is unforgivable.
There have been over four million migrant encounters at our southern border since February 2021. The crisis is only getting worse.
It was great to connect with HE Murat Mercan, the Ambassador of Turkiye. We discussed the importance of transatlantic partnerships between the United States and the Republic of Turkiye.

On Friday, I joined US Senators Sherrod Brown (OH) and Susan Collins (ME) and US Representatives Jason Smith (MO-08), Judy Chu (CA-24), and Jan Schakowsky (IL-9) in introducing the Increasing Mental Health Options Act of 2022. This bill will remove unnecessary barriers that have kept psychologists, who are well-equipped to provide mental health care, from delivering care to seniors under Medicare.
